Articles.Content:
Realistic ISS international space station dev thread

Work is underway to get this working again in ksp

current version download [HERE](https://www.dropbox.com/s/36ei1hfg5i85hbk/ISSmodrev2.zip?dl=0)

How to find parts:

![X3njU5M.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/X3njU5M.jpg)

<iframe allowfullscreen="true" frameborder="0" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/3DCxlZe8O9U?feature=oembed" width="480"></iframe>

**Edited <time datetime="2016-06-23T02:37:04Z" title="06/23/2016 02:37  AM" data-short="8 yr">June 23, 2016</time> by Mike-NZ**
  
additions

Well maybe just put a license up now so the mods don't have to remove the download.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-03T22:57:24Z" title="06/03/2015 10:57  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 3, 2015</time> by hieywiey**
  
Removed [REDACTED]

Ahem.

All I see is a real life image of the Dream Chaser, no downloads, or text...

> 
> Ahem.
> All I see is a real life image of the Dream Chaser, no downloads, or text...

 Same here.

> 
> Ahem.
> All I see is a real life image of the Dream Chaser, no downloads, or text...

hahahaha relax he's working on it lol. Its amazing how the word Dream Chaser and ISS make people jump out of their skin. In this case they are both in the same thread title. People must be going nuts right now lol.

> 
> Ahem.
> All I see is a real life image of the Dream Chaser, no downloads, or text...

Are you starting up the hype train for this????

> 
> Are you starting up the hype train for this????

No, it's just confusing. Why start a thread with just an image?

Likely because he's editing it as we post.

Granted, he didn't have to post to do that, but even so.

> 
> No, it's just confusing. Why start a thread with just an image?

To stir up hype of course! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

![TlnPsB5.gif](http://i.imgur.com/TlnPsB5.gif)

> 
> Likely because he's editing it as we post.
> Granted' date=' he didn't have to post to do that, but even so.[/quote']
> 
> Agreed. it was probably an accident.

Will have something for you all to test by this weekend.

stay tuned!

> 
> No, it's just confusing. Why start a thread with just an image?

well I suspect it's because he's also working on a different, 

killer, 

amazing mod that I'm really not a liberty to reveal at this time 

on account of it's [a secret](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/121748-Component-Space-Shuttle-CSS-ksp-1-0-2-unofficial-release-thread)

![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif)

*posting here to follow*

Also could you make the cargo Dreamchaser? I still wish SNC would be less secretive about some stuff though, like that time during a landing test one of the gear didn't deploy. They STILL haven't released footage of that. [https://youtu.be/uHJ2QV0nPEA](https://youtu.be/uHJ2QV0nPEA)
No worries.
Guess this steps aside abit, because there are still loads of things to be done with CSS. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> Guess this steps aside abit, because there are still loads of things to be done with CSS. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Yes 

but I am working on these at the same time
is the dream chaser still in development?
Basically finished but I need to upload as a beta for people to test and give feedback. Im in new zealand so uploads or updates may be during americas 3am or something

> 
> Basically finished but I need to upload as a beta for people to test and give feedback. Im in new zealand so uploads or updates may be during americas 3am or something

I'm up for any testing you need done, but if it won't be uploaded until 3am (I'm on the west coast of the US) I'll have to do it tomorrow.

What I meant with my question though was in real life, sorry for the confusion.

Ooooh I see. According to the wiki its still in development

- - - Updated - - -

Interesting read On the wiki

I will need to modify the model a lil bit to add flaps as this one has none. it only relies on reaction wheel torque and control surface implementation which bugs out a bit

![biBOvhD.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/biBOvhD.jpg)

- - - Updated - - -

![FKBo6KI.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/FKBo6KI.jpg)
It looks awesome, is it one piece?

not one piece. 4 main parts + wheels. I will get back to modeling the control surfaces today. I have been so busy with the CSS but I can take a few hours break

- - - Updated - - -

![Z73.jpg](http://www.nasaspaceflight.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/12/Z73.jpg)
What if i put it in the CSS? It looks like it would fit IRL at least

> 
> What if i put it in the CSS? It looks like it would fit IRL at least

It will not fit inside the orbiter cargo bay. It's meant to be launched atop an Atlas V 401. I don't know how realistic it would be to make foldable wings in order to put it inside the orbiter cargo bay, and I don't really see the point of going all out Xzibit and putting shuttles inside of shuttle because you like shuttles ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

http://i.imgur.com/0qoKkZw.jpg"]![0qoKkZw.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/0qoKkZw.jpg)
